de.esoco.lib.property

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.property.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable datatype that encapsulates RGB color data and provides conversions to other color data formats like HTML strings. Instances of this classes are created through the different valueOf() methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color brighter()
      Returns a color value that is 10 percent brighter than this instance by invoking the changeBrightness(int) method.
      Color brightest()
      Calculates the brightest RGB value that can be created from this instance.
      Color changeBrightness(int nPercent)
      Returns a derived color with a brightness that has been changed by the given percentage.
      Color darker()
      Returns a color value that is 10 percent darker than this instance by invoking the changeBrightness(int) method.
      int getBlue()
      Returns the blue part of this color.
      int getGreen()
      Returns the green part of this color.
      int getRed()
      Returns the red part of this color.
      java.lang.String toHtml()
      Converts this color to a hexadecimal RGB string as used in HTML and CSS, including the '#' prefix.
      int toRGB()
      Converts this color into the corresponding RGB integer value.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the same as toHtml().
      static Color valueOf(int nRgbColor)
      Returns a color instance for a combined RGB integer value.
      static Color valueOf(int nRed, int nGreen, int nBlue)
      Returns a color instance from RGB integer values.
      static Color valueOf(java.lang.String sHtmlColor)
      Converts an HTML color string into a color object.

    • Method Detail

      • valueOf

        public static Color valueOf(int nRgbColor)
        Returns a color instance for a combined RGB integer value. The single color components are considered to be in the range of (0 - 255), i.e. a byte for each.
        Parameters:
        nRgbColor - The integer value containing the RGB value bytes
        Returns:
        The color instance

      • valueOf

        public static Color valueOf(java.lang.String sHtmlColor)
        Converts an HTML color string into a color object.
        Parameters:
        sHtmlColor - The HTML color string (a leading '#' will be ignored)
        Returns:
        The color instance

      • valueOf

        public static Color valueOf(int nRed,
                            int nGreen,
                            int nBlue)
        Returns a color instance from RGB integer values.
        Parameters:
        nRed - The red component
        nGreen - The green component
        nBlue - The blue component
        Returns:
        A new color instance

      • brighter

        public Color brighter()
        Returns a color value that is 10 percent brighter than this instance by invoking the changeBrightness(int) method.
        Returns:
        The brighter color

      • brightest

        public Color brightest()
        Calculates the brightest RGB value that can be created from this instance. That will be the color where all color components have been multiplied with the factor that converts the brightest component to the maximum value of 255.
        Returns:
        The resulting color

      • changeBrightness

        public Color changeBrightness(int nPercent)
        Returns a derived color with a brightness that has been changed by the given percentage. Negative values decrease the brightness.
        Parameters:
        nPercent - The brightness change factor in percent (positive for a lighter, negative for a darker color)
        Returns:
        The resulting color

      • darker

        public Color darker()
        Returns a color value that is 10 percent darker than this instance by invoking the changeBrightness(int) method.
        Returns:
        The darker color

      • getBlue

        public final int getBlue()
        Returns the blue part of this color.
        Returns:
        The blue part

      • getGreen

        public final int getGreen()
        Returns the green part of this color.
        Returns:
        The green part

      • getRed

        public final int getRed()
        Returns the red part of this color.
        Returns:
        The red part

      • toHtml

        public java.lang.String toHtml()
        Converts this color to a hexadecimal RGB string as used in HTML and CSS, including the '#' prefix.
        Returns:
        The HTML color string

      • toRGB

        public int toRGB()
        Converts this color into the corresponding RGB integer value.
        Returns:
        An RGB integer value

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the same as toHtml().
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        TODO: DOCUMENT ME!
